```{r messages = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

suppressMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(colortable)
  library(knitr)
})

possible_colors <- valid_colors(method = "html")

possible_colors$`Color Name` <-
  color_vctr(
    possible_colors$`Color Name`,
    text_color = possible_colors$`Color Name`
  )

possible_colors$`Hex Code` <-
  color_vctr(
    possible_colors$`Hex Code`,
    background = possible_colors$`Hex Code`
  )

possible_colors %>% 
  data.frame() %>% 
  format() %>% 
  knitr::kable()

```
